text: Vapnyarka Mountain of Holohory, a natural monument 'Holohory (, - Gologory, ) is a hill range in the northwestern part of Podolian Upland, Ukraine, stretching from Lviv to Zolochiv, constituting part of the European watershed."Gołogóry" in Słownik geograficzny Królestwa Polskiego i innych krajów słowiańskich (Geographical Dictionary of the Kingdom of Poland). — Warszaw, 1881, Vol. II : Derenek — Gżac, p. 675. The name literally means "bare mountains"."Gołogóry", by Sadok Barącz, in: 'Smotrycki Melecy: szkic bibliograficzny, Poznań, 1889, pp.1-9. ==References== Category:Hills of Ukraine Category:Podolia Category:Zolochiv Raion, Lviv Oblast Category:Geography of Lviv Oblast
title: Holohory
